tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP 'm) (RB not) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NNP Christmas) (NN spirit))) (ADVP (IN at) (DT all)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NN scene)) (SBAR (IN as) (S (NP (PRP we)) (VP (VBP 're) (VP (VBG living) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (CD two) (NNS people)) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (NP (NN curse)) (NP (DT the) (NN fuck)))))) (SBAR (IN if) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP mention) (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))
